title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Was Barack Obama associated with the CIA during his college years? <!--more-->

Wayne Madsen is a Washington-based historical and investigative journalist who has specialized in national security and national political issues.
He has written for the Village Voice, Counterpunch, Corporate Watch, Multinational Monitor and many daily newspapers.  Wayne is a regular contributor to RT and Press TV and has appeared as a guest on political and national security issues on all the major networks.  As a Navy lieutenant, he managed one of the first computerized security programs for the armed forces and later worked in the National Security Agency, the Naval Data Automation Command, the State Department and private corporations.  Among his many book publications, his most recent are “National Security Surveillance: Reflections and Revelations 2001-2013”, “The Star and Sword” about the role of Saudi Arabia and Israel during 911, and “The Manufacturing of a President: The CIA’s Insertion of Barack Obama into the White House”  His website is WayneMadsenReport.com
